alert.note: Alert for Clark; Finney; Ford; Gray; Haskell; Kearny; Meade; Seward (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 08 at 5:58PM CDT until May 09 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Fire Danger Continues Monday Afternoon/Evening... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM CDT MONDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 061...062...063...074...075...076...077...078...084...085...086... 087 AND 088... ...RED FLAG WARNING IS CANCELLED FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 061...062...063...074...075... 076...077...078...084...085...086...087 AND 088... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has cancelled the Red Flag Warning Sunday. * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 062 Kearny... Fire Weather Zone 063 Finney...Fire Weather Zone 076 Haskell... Fire Weather Zone 077 Gray...Fire Weather Zone 078 Ford...Fire Weather Zone 086 Seward...Fire Weather Zone 087 Meade and Fire Weather Zone 088 Clark. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 6 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Finney; Ford; Gray; Haskell; Kearny; Meade; Seward
